name: Dolla World
description: Dolla World is a traditional 2D RPG game, using 3D render method.In this game, you have multiple route to explore the world.You will be strongger and strongger and knowing more and more truth.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 640 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
